name: Terms and conditions - (TAC-002)
terms:
1. Payment Conditions

Tooling: 50% deposit with order, 50% due upon sample approval.

Production: 50% deposit with order, 50% due before shipment.

2. Design Changes

Changes after tooling begins may result in extra cost and delay.

3. Validity

This quotation is valid for 14 days from the date of issue.

title: Terms and conditions - (TAC-001)

name: TAC-PO-001
terms:
1. 付款

货物和发票收到后，我们将在 30 天内完成付款。

2. 交货

货物必须按时送达采购订单中指定的地址。逾期交货可能导致订单取消。

3. 质量

所有物品必须符合我们的质量标准。不合格的产品将由供应商承担费用退回。
